languages.text: "Если ты так беспокоишься о моем мире, элантах, почему {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}не отправил{mf|ся|ась} искать ответы со мной{/d}?" {n}Глаза {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдарки{/g} вспыхивают недобрым огнем, а бледные губы вытягиваются в тонкую линию.{/n} "Я нашла Эклендиля умирающим в тисках очередного орудия пыток, и он раскрыл мне печальную судьбу нашего мира".

traits.locale_text: "Если ты так беспокоишься о моем мире, элантах, почему не отправил{mf|ся|ась} искать ответы со мной?" {n}Глаза {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдарки{/g} вспыхивают недобрым огнем, а бледные губы вытягиваются в тонкую линию.{/n} "Я нашла Эклендиля умирающим в тисках очередного орудия пыток, и он раскрыл мне печальную судьбу нашего мира".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}not go seeking answers by my side{/d}?" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found Eklendyl dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And he revealed the sad fate of our world to me."
languages.original_text: "Если ты так беспокоишься о моем мире, элантах, почему {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}не отправил{mf|ся|ась} искать ответы со мной{/d}?" {n}Глаза {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдарки{/g} вспыхивают недобрым огнем, а бледные губы вытягиваются в тонкую линию.{/n} "Я нашла Эклендиля умирающим в тисках очередного орудия пыток, и он раскрыл мне печальную судьбу нашего мира".

traits.locale_text: "If you are so worried about my world, elantach, why hadn't you gone to look for the answers by my side?" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} woman's eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found Eklendyl dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And he revealed the sad fate of our world to me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If you are so worried about my world, elantach, why hadn't you gone to look for the answers by my side?" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} woman's eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found Eklendyl dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And he revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

And he revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you not go seeking answers by my side?" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found Eklendyl dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And he revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}not go seeking answers by my side{/d}?" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found Eklendyl dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And he revealed the sad fate of our world to me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “如果你真的如此在乎我的世界，外界人，你当时为什么{d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}没有陪在我身边一起寻找答案{/d}？”{n}这位{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}的眼中露出了凶光，她苍白的嘴唇抿成了一条窄线。{/n}“我在酷刑台上找到了埃克伦迪，那时他已奄奄一息。他向我揭示了我们的世界悲惨的结局。”
languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}not go seeking answers by my side{/d}?" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found Eklendyl dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And he revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: “如果你真的如此在乎我的世界，外界人，你当时为什么没有陪在我身边一起寻找答案？”{n}这位{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}的眼中露出了凶光，她苍白的嘴唇抿成了一条窄线。{/n}“我在酷刑台上找到了埃克伦迪，那时他已奄奄一息。他向我揭示了我们的世界悲惨的结局。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you not go seeking answers by my side?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found Eklendyl dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And he revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

languages.text: «Si tanto te preocupa mi mundo, elantach, ¿por qué {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}no me has acompañado en busca de respuestas{/d}?». {n}Los ojos de la {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} relucen, amenazantes, y sus labios pálidos forman una delgada línea.{/n} «Encontré a Eklendyl moribundo, atrapado en otro dispositivo de tortura. Y me reveló el triste destino de nuestro mundo».
languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}not go seeking answers by my side{/d}?" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found Eklendyl dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And he revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: «Si tanto te preocupa mi mundo, elantach, ¿por qué no me has acompañado en busca de respuestas?». {n}Los ojos de la {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} relucen, amenazantes, y sus labios pálidos forman una delgada línea.{/n} «Encontré a Eklendyl moribundo, atrapado en otro dispositivo de tortura. Y me reveló el triste destino de nuestro mundo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、我の惑星をそんなに心配しているのなら、なぜ{d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}我のそばで答えを探しに行かなかった{/d}のだ？」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}の目が威嚇するように光り、青白い唇が細い筋を描く。{/n}「我はエクレンディルが別の拷問器具に抱かれて死んでいるのを見つけた。そしてエクレンディルは我らの惑星の悲しい運命を我に明らかにした」
languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}not go seeking answers by my side{/d}?" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found Eklendyl dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And he revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、我の惑星をそんなに心配しているのなら、なぜ{d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}我のそばで答えを探しに行かなかった{/d}のだ？」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}の目が威嚇するように光り、青白い唇が細い筋を描く。{/n}「我はエクレンディルが別の拷問器具に抱かれて死んでいるのを見つけた。そしてエクレンディルは我らの惑星の悲しい運命を我に明らかにした」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr Euch so um meine Welt sorgt, Elantach, warum habt Ihr {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}nicht an meiner Seite nach Antworten gesucht{/d}?" {n}Die Augen der {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} blitzen bedrohlich auf und ihre fahlen Lippen verzerren sich zu einem dünnen Strich.{/n} "Ich fand Eklendyl sterbend in der Umarmung eines weiteren Folterwerkzeugs vor. Und er offenbarte mir das traurige Schicksal unserer Welt."
languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}not go seeking answers by my side{/d}?" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found Eklendyl dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And he revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr Euch so um meine Welt sorgt, Elantach, warum habt Ihr nicht an meiner Seite nach Antworten gesucht?" {n}Die Augen der {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} blitzen bedrohlich auf und ihre fahlen Lippen verzerren sich zu einem dünnen Strich.{/n} "Ich fand Eklendyl sterbend in der Umarmung eines weiteren Folterwerkzeugs vor. Und er offenbarte mir das traurige Schicksal unserer Welt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Si vous vous préoccupez réellement de mon monde, elantach, pourquoi ne m'avez-vous {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}pas accompagnée dans ma quête de réponses{/d} ? »{n}L'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} s'interrompt et serre les lèvres, une lueur menaçante dans les yeux.{/n} « J'ai trouvé Eklendyl à l'agonie dans l'étreinte d'une autre machine de torture, et il m'a révélé le triste sort de notre monde. »
languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}not go seeking answers by my side{/d}?" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found Eklendyl dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And he revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous vous préoccupez réellement de mon monde, elantach, pourquoi ne m'avez-vous pas accompagnée dans ma quête de réponses ? » {n}L'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} s'interrompt et serre les lèvres, une lueur menaçante dans les yeux.{/n} « J'ai trouvé Eklendyl à l'agonie dans l'étreinte d'une autre machine de torture, et il m'a révélé le triste sort de notre monde. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, dünyam için bu kadar endişeleniyorsan neden {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}cevapların peşine birlikte düşmedik{/d}?" {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari'nin{/g} gözlerinden tehditkâr bir bakış saçılıyor, solgun dudaklarıysa ince bir çizgi hâlini alıyor.{/n} "Eklendyl'i bir işkence cihazıyla sarmalanmış vaziyette, ölümle burun buruna buldum. Benimle dünyamızın hüzünlü kaderini paylaştı."
languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you {d|Encyclopedia:YrlietQ1_ManagedHerself}not go seeking answers by my side{/d}?" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found Eklendyl dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And he revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, dünyam için bu kadar endişeleniyorsan neden cevapların peşine birlikte düşmedik?" {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'nin gözlerine tehditkâr bir bakış yayılıyor. Solgun dudaklarıysa ince bir çizgi hâlini alıyor.{/n} "Eklendyl'i bir işkence cihazıyla sarmalanmış bir hâlde, ölümle burun buruna buldum. Benimle dünyamızın hüzünlü kaderini paylaştı."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
